summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding lodging arrangements in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, for an operational travel plan related to the Epstein investigation. The email discusses hotel availability and government rates, and includes an attachment titled 'Epstein_Island_Operational_Travel_Plan.docx'.

persons.name: SA Huckemeyer
persons.context: Author of the email providing lodging information for the FBI's Rapid Deployment Team in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, for an operational travel plan related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: FBI Lodging Coordination for Epstein Investigation
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to coordinate lodging in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, for an operational travel plan related to the Epstein investigation, discussing hotel availability and government rates.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated August 7, 2019, indicating active FBI investigation planning related to Epstein.
The subject and attachment reference an 'Epstein_Island_Operational_Travel_Plan.docx', suggesting operational planning for travel to locations associated with Epstein.
The email discusses lodging in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, which is near Epstein's private island, Little St. James.
The sender, SA Huckemeyer, is identified as part of the FBI New York Rapid Deployment Team.
The email mentions that most hotels are closed from storms, and Sugar Bay Resort is open for government and recovery with a government rate.
